title: Devikondru
text:
Hi! I’m Devi, a graduate student pursuing a Master’s in Data Analytics Engineering with a passion for transforming data into actionable insights. With a strong foundation in computer science and a specialization in big data analytics from my bachelor’s degree, I thrive at the intersection of technology and data-driven problem-solving.
My current work focuses on leveraging advanced analytical techniques and tools to extract meaningful patterns and trends from complex datasets. From glacier inventory datasets to business intelligence, I’m always eager to explore how data can drive impactful decisions.
I’m particularly skilled in data visualization, statistical modeling, and machine learning, and enjoy collaborating on projects that solve real-world challenges through innovation. Whether it’s through coding, research, or developing interactive dashboards, my goal is to make data accessible and valuable to a broad audience.

title: About
text:
Welcome to my professional resource hub. I am a Data Analytics Engineer with a background in Computer Science and Big Data Analytics. With a focus on applying advanced analytics to real-world problems, I specialize in data-driven insights, visualization, and analysis.
Currently, my work involves analyzing complex datasets, such as glacier inventories, to uncover patterns, trends, and actionable insights. This platform serves as a space where I share my projects, visualizations, and research. Whether you’re a fellow researcher, a data enthusiast, or a potential collaborator, I invite you to explore my work and get in touch.
Feel free to browse through my projects and see how data is transforming decision-making across various fields. I’m always excited to connect professionally and explore opportunities for collaboration
